item.title: Sort Python Dictionary
item.description: Sort Python dict in various ways Original Data world_cup_wins = { "Brazil": 5, "Germany": 4, "Italy": 4, "Argentina": 2, "France": 2, "Uruguay": 2, "England": 1, "Spain": 1 } SORT DICTIONARY BY KEY ASCENDING for key, value in sorted(world_cup_wins.items(), key=lambda x: x[0]): print(key, value) Output: Argentina 2 Brazil 5 England 1 France 2 Germany 4 Italy 4 Spain 1 Uruguay 2 SORT DICTIONARY BY KEY DESCENDING for key, value in sorted(world_cup_wins.
